channel.title: CreativeScape
channel.description:
CreativeScape.
Is there a way to actually delete the Cache so people can download the client and just play?. I am not making my Server 24/7 for a while.
I am also going to be deleting the MySQL. But how would i delete the Cache and make the Client work so you don't have to download Cache before playing the server.
Please help.
